snippet: Scottish fund manager Aberdeen Asset Management is exploring possible options for a tie-up with insurer Standard Life, Sky News reported on Saturday, in a deal which could total 11 billion pounds....

headline.main: Texas Town Looks to Tell Story of Mexican Guest Workers
headline.print_headline: Texas Town Looks to Tell Story of Mexican Guest Workers

lead_paragraph: Scottish fund manager Aberdeen Asset Management is exploring possible options for a tie-up with insurer Standard Life, Sky News reported on Saturday, in a deal which could total 11 billion pounds.
